description: **New to Lisbon or already feel at home here?** **Join us this week @ Tribe Social Club!** It‚Äôs a chance to meet friendly faces, catch up with friends, or simply enjoy good drinks in a laid-back atmosphere. **Happy Hour** **\- 7:30pm\-8:30pm:** üç∫ Small Beer: Only 2 Euros! üç∑ Glass of Wine: Just 3.50 Euros! üçπ Cocktails: A steal at 6 Euros ***About us:*** We're a group of Nomads, Slowmads, Expats, and Locals who love to meet like-minded people and have a regular meetup running every Thursday since 2017! And the Nomad community is buzzing in Lisbon! Check out our socials to see photos and get updates: [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lisbondigitalnomads/) join our [Slack community](https://lisbondigitalnomads.org/slack) to connect with others! We're all volunteers, these events are not for profit, and we try to find the most awesome ways to connect you on a personal and a professional level. ***Join our team:*** We're currently looking for talented community hosts to join our team. If you think you're up for the challenge of hosting our Thursday meetups and giving back to the community - [please apply to become a host](https://forms.gle/bD388ScQehorr2CH8). We would love to hear from you! ***Do you have a venue for 100+ people indoors? Partner with us:*** We have some spots available for venues that would like to host our Thursday meetups. Our events bring a huge boost in revenue to you on a Thursday night. Get in touch! [Please fill up our venue partnership form](https://bit.ly/ldn-venue-apply) and we'll be in touch with you. Whether you're a nomad passing through Lisbon, staying for a season, living in Lisbon, or are an aspiring digital nomad, you're all welcome to join our events! **Friendly reminder** Our meetups are all about creating a safe, inclusive, and welcoming space for everyone, even as our community grows. Remember, everyone has the right to their boundaries‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs a hug, a dance, a drink, or a conversation.
